# TDC-E Developer Documentation

This repository contains the published documentation for TDC-E devices.

## Documentation Versions

- **[TDC-E BaseOS](./tdc-e-base/)** - Current firmware documentation
- **[TDC-E L4M](../../wiki)** - Legacy firmware documentation

## Viewing the Documentation

Visit: https://sickag.github.io/sick_tdc-e-developers-documentation/

## Source Repository

This documentation is generated from the main GitLab repository and published to GitHub Pages automatically.
